author: @Sachinsirav4554

text:
I bought this Ampere Nexus ST Model EV Bike in July 2024 and I am using it for more than past 8 months. Only thing I had in mind when I purchased this bike was to choose the mid-drive model EV. As I had only few option and I did not want to go with Ather or OLA, I bought this bike. Initally I was happy with the bike, because everyone looked into it and many people attracted to it due to its unique appearance and color.
But Personaly I feel disappointed after 2 or 3 months of usage. Because,

1. I did not expect 136 km per charge as claimed but I was expecting at least 95 to 100 kms for 3.2 kwh LFH Battery.. But I am getting only 70-75 km per charge (with 20% battery limit).

2. There is no IoT on device as they say, We can not check the charging statistics, store the vehicle registration and owner information on device, many functions are not available as they claimed before launching. 7 inch display is just to see the speedometer and odometer readings... 3inch tft screen is sufficient for that.

3. Even after 10 months of launch, No safegaurd and other much required accessories are not available in the ampere showroom and outside shops as well. Getting dent or scratch on the bike body is inevitable. With out safeguard, no one can protect their bike from scratches. Ampere should work on it and give us the safety guard and other accessories.

4. I feel, the bike was super overpriced with this specification, they have launched the new model called magnus Neo, they are giving 5 years warranty for the battery for Rs.79,999.. But I bought the Nexus ST model for 1,40,000/- but they are giving only 3 years of warranty. When I enquired about entension of the warranty, I got shocked that, I have to pay Rs.15000+ for 2 years of additional warranty and the ampere dealer is not aware about the claim procedure.

5. After 5 months of usage, It started making much noise in the headlamp section. When I carefully inspected, I noticed that some portion of the head section lock is broken.. It is making horrible noise when I ride. Everyday I am feeling sad, when I take the vehicle on roads. It is making so much of noise in city uneven roads.

I suggest the people to look for the alternative to this bike, beacuse It is not value for the hard-earned money... For Rs.1,40,000/-, If we get only 75 kms per charge, It is not worthy.

I dont say, think before you buy this bike... I am saying go for the better vehicle instead of ampere Nexus model..
author: @RamMohankumar
